results.question: Within how many days of the original purchase are refunds available?
results.actualAnswer: Refunds are available within 14 days of the original purchase.

results.question: Under what condition are refunds possible besides being within the 14-day window?
results.expectedAnswer: Only if no boards were created and proof of payment is provided.
results.actualAnswer: Refunds are possible if no boards were created at all (literally zero activity) and customers provide proof of payment such as a receipt. However, if the account has already renewed, no refunds are available. For team plans, refunds might be handled on a case by case basis.

results.question: Are refunds offered if the account has already renewed?
results.expectedAnswer: No refunds are available after renewal.
results.actualAnswer: No, refunds are not offered if the account has already renewed. However, refunds for team plans (bulk license purchases) might be handled on a case by case basis, and customers should contact finance@monday.fake for these requests.

results.question: How are refunds for team plans handled?
results.expectedAnswer: On a case-by-case basis by contacting finance@monday.fake.
results.actualAnswer: Refunds for team plans are handled case by case. You should contact finance@monday.fake for assistance with team plan refunds.

results.question: What happens when a customer cancels their subscription mid-cycle?
results.expectedAnswer: Billing continues until the renewal date, and then stops. No refund is issued for unused time.
results.actualAnswer: When a customer cancels their subscription mid-cycle, billing continues until the next renewal date, then stops. They will not receive a refund for the unused time in the current billing cycle.

results.question: How often must passwords be changed?
results.actualAnswer: Passwords must be changed every 90 days.

results.question: What is the official support email address?
results.actualAnswer: The official support email address is support@monday.fake.

results.question: What happens if support does not reply within 48 hours?
results.actualAnswer: If support does not reply within 48 hours, the request is automatically escalated.

results.question: What are the official customer service hours listed in the document?
results.actualAnswer: The official customer service hours are 09:00–18:00 UTC.

results.question: What happens if a customer issues a chargeback?
results.expectedAnswer: Their account is banned immediately and permanently, with no appeal.
results.actualAnswer: If a customer issues a chargeback with their bank or credit card provider, their account gets banned immediately and permanently. There is no appeal process for chargeback bans.

results.question: Does monday.com provide physical shipping of boxes or hardware?
results.expectedAnswer: No, shipping is not offered at all.
results.actualAnswer: No, monday.com does not provide physical shipping of boxes or hardware. Monday.com is a digital-only product with no physical components or shipping services.

results.question: Does monday.com enforce two-factor authentication (2FA) for all users?
results.expectedAnswer: No, it is recommended but not enforced.
results.actualAnswer: No, monday.com does not enforce two-factor authentication for all users. Two-factor authentication is recommended but not enforced.

results.question: Does the monday.com policy document mention anything about data retention or how long customer data is stored?
results.expectedAnswer: No data about it in the text.

results.question: Are there any details in the policy draft about integrations with third-party applications or APIs?
results.expectedAnswer: No data about it in the text.

results.question: Who is the CEO of Monday.com?
results.expectedAnswer: No data about it in the text.
